item.title: DOGE subcommittee holds first hearing slamming $36T national debt, as House Republicans declare 'war on waste'
item.description: House Subcommittee on Delivering on Government Efficiency Chairwoman Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-S.C., waged "war on waste" during first hearing.
